actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to extend the provisions of the General Exchange Act, as amended, to certain lands in order that they may become parts of the Umatilla and Wallowa National Forests, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Extends the provisions of the General Exchange Act to provide for the conveyance of specified lands in Oregon to the United States. Specifies that such lands, upon acceptance of title, shall become parts of the Umatilla and Wallowa National Forests, Oregon.

titles.title: A bill to extend the provisions of the General Exchange Act, as amended, to certain lands in order that they may become parts of the Umatilla and Wallowa National Forests, and for other purposes.
